answers.answer: Hi,How are you? Do you still experience the symptoms that you mentioned? The blurring of vision may indeed be due to eye issues or associated with underlying medical conditions like migraine, diabetes or hypertension. If it persists, it is best that you have this checked by your doctor for proper evaluation. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: sometimes  I have these  brief  moments, where my vision is blurred.  for like a second or two.  sometimes dizziness.. ringing in my ears.. sometimes.  I just had my eyes checked last year.  my doctor told me that I am fine.. I don't need glasses..  what scares me is if: what if it's  something like a tumor in my head??  I don't mean to be like a paranoid worrier.. I don't want to waste time & money by going to the doctor's office if it's nothing.. please get back to me ASAP  by email..***@****
title: brief, occasional blurred vision:  sometimes dizzyness:
